name: Super Duper Tripler Shooter
description:
SDTS is a small arcade shooting game made for The Dream Arcade Archive game jam.

Click to shoot. The furthest you click, the bigger the recoil. Collect those circles. Avoid squares.

Have fun!

Work done by:

Design, gamefeel and other stuff by Iker

Programming by Silvia 

General development & cool stuff by Jorge

Fullscreen recomended
